website_summaries.verdict: It’s rare to find quality fruit snacks that are vegan, made with real fruit, and have no artificial colors. Most importantly, this fruit leather is absolutely delicious.
pros: Pack includes 48 fruit leather snacks in six flavors: cherry, grape, apricot, apple, strawberry, and raspberry
cons: Some flavors are chewier than others

website_summaries.verdict: Fruit purees are the main ingredient in these fruit snacks.
pros: Real fruit rather than just fruit flavoring
Chewy, but not likely to stick to your teeth
cons: Some of the flavors are a little difficult to differentiate from each other

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons to the Fruit Leather.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's just me but they all taste like strawberry, down a star. It's a healthy option so that brought it up one star but they are super sticky to eat down a star, not good frozen down a star, big enough to eat two and not to want to eat the entire box in one sitting up a star. Appealing to my dog no star change (because she eats everything anyway). Fruit Leather name up a star. The portion could be bigger so I don't have to eat two, down a star.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these! So tasty :)) 8 of each flavor
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Different texture & not very flavorful
customer_reviews.text: If you’re used to Motts type of fruit snacks or fruit roll ups, these have a much different texture & flavor. Also, they aren’t like the ones I remember having as a kid - thin & flavorful. Although I’m sure they’re healthier, they are are thick and gelatin like in consistency and quite flavorless. I personally didn’t like them at all and neither did my kids. I brought them to the break room at work thinking coworkers would snatch them up, but they were not a hit there either.
customer_reviews.author: kbogo

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, healthy and convenient snack! A real fruit serving.
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Great snack to grab and go for kids or adults. No added sugar or corn syrup! It is just pureed fruit. Since fruit can go bad or get bruised en route, these are an easy form to bring on outings or camping. Keep a few on hand for when the neighbor kids come over. Easy to fit in a purse, backpack, sports bag or lunch. Healthier than chips, candy and pop for kids. My family loves the variety of flavors. They are even mom-approved. At only 50 calories, they are easy to pair with a cheese stick or veggies for a larger snack.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 Strawberry
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping that our package would not match the other negative reviews. Ours was missing 3 strawberry strips. I would avoid buying these again. It feels like I got scammed .. and makes me wonder if someone opened the box at the plant, stole 3, and/or tried to make more money by lessening the qty. in our box. Hard to say, but it's not right.
customer_reviews.author: Kenbo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: These are really tasty, especially the strawberry and raspberry flavors. The price Is reasonable. They’re a little chewy but won’t tug on your teeth or fillings. I stick these in my purse for when I need a snack or my sugar level gets low. I’m Not a diabetic, I just don’t eat breakfast and don’t always have time to stop for food so these work good for me. I recommend them. Only negative comment I have is that some of them are a little dried out. I haven’t finished the box yet. I’ve probably ate 20 of them so far. 3-4 were dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Change in taste?
customer_reviews.text: The first time I got them was last July for a summer vacation. They were great, my whole family loved them. I purchased them again this December and they tasted terrible. I do not know what was changed. The box says "New Look! Same Great Taste!" but that couldn't be further from the truth. I am now throwing away the box, with 30+ fruit leathers still in there, because no one in my family wanted any more. I will not be purchasing any more for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Sabato

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor but I think the ones I got were a little stale
customer_reviews.text: I love fruit leather and I like stretch island, the ones I received I think are a little stale, I am not sure if something is happening in shipping or storing but they all turned brown and were a little dried out, but the flavor was still good.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: 14 missing from box
customer_reviews.text: I opened up the box and tried a strawberry fruit leather, then gave my son an apple fruit leather. The one I tried was good, and I wanted to try a cherry fruit leather, but couldn't find one. I dumped out the entire box and counted them all, to find that there were 0 cherry leathers and only 2 grape. There are supposed to be 48 in the box, with 8 of each flavor. I am missing 14! NOT happy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Moutos

customer_reviews.title: The taste is just.... not right.
customer_reviews.text: Alright, so I purchased these as a cheaper option to the organic fruit leather I had been buying. The price was great, and I liked they had so many flavors. That being said: My husband and I tried the various flavors today, and straight up, it tastes like I’m sucking on gritty jelly right out of the jar. There’s no other way to describe it other than imagine sucking on a spoonful of jelly. The texture has a strange grittiness to it, too. We’ll, unfortunately for my wallet, be tossing these. It’s too much. I was hoping for something different than gritty jam.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: This was the nastiest thing I have ever tasted. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was the nastiest thing I have ever tasted. Each of us tried a different flavor and we all spit it out. YUCK!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy! Picky kid approved treat!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! Our box just arrived and already our kids have declared that these are AMAZING! Our super picky 6yr old daughter, who refuses most everything, has already eaten 3 of these this morning. Guess we should have bought more. I saw these previously for $20 a box, but scored them for $10 and decided to give them a try, glad we did! They are very different from fruit 'gummies', but in a great way - no added sugar or presevatives, they are non GMO and each bar contains a 1/4 of fruit and only 45 calories. These will be a staple in our theme park bag and kids lunches.
customer_reviews.author: ShirleynDeanna

customer_reviews.title: Not like they used to be
customer_reviews.text: I was cleaning out my pantry for the first time in a while and found a single, expired, Stretch Island fruit leather. It looked/smelled fine so I ate it and remembered how much I liked these fruit leathers. I then came to Amazon to purchase some more. The box I received says, "New look! Same great taste!" but the product was disgusting, much worse than the expired one I had recently eaten! I took a bite out of each flavor, but couldn't force myself to finish even one full strip--they're that bad. The leathers are dried out and gritty, with barely any flavor. I will not be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A good snack
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't say it's a "healthy" snack, but at the very least, it's not an "unhealthy" snack. There are so many processed snacks for sale these days that are chock-full of sugars/sodium/calories/etc., and it's nice to see packaged food that's relatively clean in comparison. The taste is just fine (not great, but not bad), the portion is sufficient (seems small, but is surprisingly filling), and it pairs well as a complementary dessert to top off a meal. If it were nutritious I would have given it 5 stars, but for what it is, it's still one of the better snacks you can buy without having to worry as much about your blood pressure. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joe the Anime Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bland flavors. Like dried out jam.
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping we'd like these, but we don't. Bland flavors. Like dried out jam. Won't buy again. I can't get my kids to eat the rest of them. I've cancelled my subscription to the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria B. Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Not appealing
customer_reviews.text: I got these when there was a price drop on them. They have a lot of great reviews so I figured I would give them a try. My kids love all kinds of fruit snacks and I love the fact that these are all natural, real fruit and gluten free. The downside was that they dont taste that good. I think they are too thick and they just have a wierd texture. They don't smell that great either. They are sweet but just not enjoyable. The kids don't like them and usually I love fruit leather but these are just not appealing. Wouldn't buy again. It's definitly an acquired taste.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great value, perfect flavor
customer_reviews.text: We recently received some of these in a lunch pack and my youngest became obsessed. I was disappointed I couldn't find them in store. Great price for the quality and quantity. Perfect variety. My 5 year old is super picky, so the fact that he loves these is a bonus. Even I enjoy them, including the raspberry (I'm not a fan of raspberry anything--except these apparently!)
customer_reviews.author: TabbieFayth

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality Product But Lacks Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My gold standard for fruit leather is the Trader Joe's 'Fruit Wrap'. I thought I'd give these a try as they're a few cents less per unit, particularly on subscription. The Stretch Island product seems like it's pretty high quality, made solely with fruit puree concentrates. My disappointment came from the texture, which I found to be a bit mealy, and I thought they lacked flavor. By contrast, the TJ's product has more ingredients including fruit pectin, but I like both the texture and flavor better.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wright

customer_reviews.title: Blah, gross!
customer_reviews.text: Blah. These are a hard pass for me. Each one is basically different flavored concentrates of a dried out apple/pear puree. The sad part is that there isn't a significant flavor between any of them... they're pretty much the same color and flavor - all of them. Note: these are not flavorful and juicy tasing like fruit roll-ups or other similar products. These lack any tang so they're pastey when you eat them. The grit a lot of people reference is likely from the pear puree. I really shouldn't have bought this big of a box because it's all going out in the trash at the end of the week. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LBelle24

customer_reviews.title: Insane amount of pieces for the price - Healthy as you can get for a fruit snack.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to all other related fruit leather/snacks this is easily the best deal. $10 wouldn't get you far anywhere else but this is a lot! Couldn't really make it cheaper at home either. 0 grams of added sugar too! I'd love if they added a pear flavor, but it's in the ingredients so I can't complain. The only complaint I have is there's not much difference between flavors. A- overall.
customer_reviews.author: Rapid Randy

customer_reviews.title: All fairly much the same flavoring.
customer_reviews.text: So far these are the best I have found but due to the use of apple and pear puree all flavors tend to taste fairly similar. These are fantastic for the ingredient list alone though. This is, unless ingredients are hiding behind "puree" just puree'd fruit that has been dehydrated. No added anything. Impressive. They hold a different texture and are stickier than other leathers I have tried. Portions are sized appropriately although you will probably eat more than one. I wish there was a better way than individually wrapping each portion in plastic though. Overall a good way to get fruit into you. I'd buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but I'm very pleased! These are delicious, I really like the texture, size and thickness of them, and it's great that they're individually packaged. I like them so much that I ate 5 during a marathon research project. I found out later that, while the sugar in them comes from the fruit puree they're made with, each one counts as 1 fruit on the diabetic food exchange. While I've noticed no ill effects, it's good that they come in individual packages or I might have made a worse pig of myself!
customer_reviews.author: whitequeen

customer_reviews.title: Giant box, still lasting
customer_reviews.text: We bought this giant box of fruit leather at the start of the pandemic as a snack for our toddler. She has one almost every day as a treat after playtime outside, but somehow, it seems like we still have the entire box. There are so many fruit leathers, like Mary Poppin's designed the box or something. My daughter loves them, they are big enough to be a substantial snack but not too big for her to finish in one go. They are easy to pack on the go, but who are you kidding, we aren't going anywhere. Not in this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter asks for these all the time, and I don't feel guilty about giving them to her. Obviously, they aren't as good as giving an actual piece of fruit, but they're great as an alternative to more sugary fruit snacks and as an on-the-go snack when it would be harder to bring fresh fruit. They're slightly sticky, so we sometimes have to wipe their hands after they eat them, but other than that, they're not messy. They love all of the flavors, so I don't have to worry about ending up with a bunch of one flavor that they didn't like.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMom2019

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a fruit snack addict. She has autism and we used fruit snacks as her "rewards" during therapy. Unfortunately this caused her to develop cavities. 😣 During the pandemic her therapy has been put on hold and I started looking for a better alternative to her beloved snack. Raisins didn't do it, but she really likes these fruit leathers! I know they are still loaded with (natural) sugar, but I appreciate the fact that she is getting something more out of it. I just ordered a second box.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I got 12 more than advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I received 8 of all flavors, as promised, but then got 12 more Apricot for a total of 60! I hope my additional Apricot didn't get taken from other boxes they were preparing. Tastes pretty good, not artificial like mass-market brands. Love that there's no additional sugar added. They use fillers with apple and pear puree just like the mass-market brands, but the flavor of each is still there with apricot, strawberry, raspberry, etc. puree. A great alternative nonetheless! Regardless, I'm happy. :-) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: cipher_nemo

customer_reviews.title: Love the quantity and variety offered - Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety offered in these packs. I have two kids and each person in the household has a different (few) flavor(s) that they like. That makes it easy to make everyone happy. The different flavors do actually have different textures, so keep that in mind (not necessarily a bad thing and makes sense, but some kids/people are sensitive to texture). They are very soft and chewy, without being gooey or rubbery (as in - just right!).
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Delicious as always. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I did receive the full 48, with the exception of no strawberry and double apple portion. The rest are 8 each and apple 16. Must have ran out, it works, even though I love strawberry lol. They are not cheap sugar fruit roll ups, they are real dried fruit snacks, which I love! Delicious as always. * I understand times are tough during a pandemic, and just happy they are filling orders even if they have to make a few shuffles of flavors. I won't get picky over a few fruit snacks :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and sticky treats. No added sugar!
customer_reviews.text: I got a box of these for about ten bucks so I thought the price was pretty good to give these a try. They are a bit chewy and on the dry side but they are fruit leather. I like that it has no added sugar which makes them good fruit snacks alternatives. It does run on the sweeter side (prefer it not as sweet) and each is made with apple and pear puree so they taste similar. What I do not like is that it is quite sticky, sticky to the teeth and sticky on the hands so just carefully roll down the plastic wrapper without touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Chau T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters!!! They think its candy but its not shhh dont tell any one
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these! They think their getting candy but its not candy its fruit a great way for parents with picky eaters they look and smell good i personally have not tried them i dont eat junk food all thay much wether its be healthy or not but the price as well is great too i will be buying more!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alien1987

customer_reviews.title: Taste great and great size box
customer_reviews.text: I have to leave a review considering this is the fourth or fifth time I’ve ordered them. My daughter inhales these things and they are better than candy so I keep ordering. They do taste great. Great size package as well. They last a pretty long time considering her consumption level.
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Passable fruit leather
customer_reviews.text: I've had fruit leather from many different makers, most of them very small-scale, private enterprises. They tend to be more fibrous, thinner, a little tougher, but also more flavorful. These Stretch Island snacks are okay; identifiable as fruit leather but nothing remarkable. Definitely has a natural taste - they aren't synthetic in the slightest - but they could be improved by making them more distinct, I found all the flavors to be quite similar to one another. Not all that filling. Might be good for kids, though - for adults, it's barely a mouthful and then its gone. Worth trying out once, but I doubt I'll order any more of them.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: These are great, but I received empty packages
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've purchased this fruit leather - it's tasty and a good value. however this last time I received empty packages of fruit leather which was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Sheng

customer_reviews.title: Delicious - Missing one in last shipment
customer_reviews.text: My family and I absolutely love these fruit leathers. They taste like real fruit and don’t have the artificial fruit taste like many other fruit snack products. I did just receive another box of 48 but one fruit leather was missing. When I took the box out of the shipping envelope one of the ends was loose and had a large gap on the end of it. It could’ve just fallen out as it was being packaged. I have never had this happen before, though. Overall, these are delicious and we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Any3names

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. One package expired a year ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this at least 20 times. An excellent snack for my grandchildren. All natural. I was surprised that one of the 2 packages I received last week had a use by date of July 2018. Never happened before but there is no excuse for this. I am writing this to alert other consumers to check expiration dates on all products they buy even when using as great a company as Amazon. I sincerely hope that this was unitentional.
customer_reviews.author: Honest critic

customer_reviews.title: Great Quick Treat
customer_reviews.text: These are a good alternative to other "Fruit Snacks". $12 for 48 of them its a good deal. These are kinda of similar to the fruit strips you find at trader joes but not nearly as sticky. The variety of flavors makes sure there is something each of the kids will like. The Grape, Cherry, and Raspberry are the favorites over here.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3littles

customer_reviews.title: Very flavorful,  we love them
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of my kids love these. They are really good!! If you are expecting a fruit roll up... don't get them. They aren't it. They taste like real fruit with just the right amount if sugar taste and very flavorful!!! I have gotten some that taste kind of gooey and these don't have that texture at all....i bight a second box that's how much we enjoy them.... and I know I will be buying more because these will be perfect in the summertime to throw in a backpack when you're going to the park or on a walk
customer_reviews.author: Kelly T.

customer_reviews.title: They are sticky and all taste the same
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my 7 year old son. He tried a tropical fruit one from a friend once and liked it. With simple ingredients, I decided to try them. Sadly this didn't come with that flavor but I knew that going into it. I liked this because he could try multiple flavors. He hasn't had one he dislikes. I've tried a couple & we both agree that most taste very alike, so I'm not sure flavor really matters, oddly enough. The downside is that they are really sticky so my son uses the wrapper to hold on to it. To me, that's annoying. If he asks for more, I will buy them.
customer_reviews.author: forkfairy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely like leather; too sour too.
customer_reviews.text: These are not fruit *strips* they are fruit *leather*. I didn't think there was much of a difference, but now I know there is. These strips are much drier than the ones I've bought at Target and Aldi. They have a much more sour flavor and they tear instead of pull. It's like they combined fruit strips with dried fruit. To me, it's not at all appealing, and my kids aren't too fond of them either. We're sticking with the Aldi and Target brand fruit strips from now on.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Guilt free snacking!
customer_reviews.text: Heckin love these little things. I have bought so many of these boxes I decided it was time to leave a review. I'm never without these. The flavor and texture reminds me of home made "fruit roll ups." A++++++ seriously Pos: - Heckin good - Funny name Cons: - Not as sweet as Fruit Snacks (but those are terrible imo, so this is a pro for me haha) - More expensive than day-old doughnuts
customer_reviews.author: Ben Reubenson

customer_reviews.title: Good, flavorful, quick snack
customer_reviews.text: Are they healthy? I don't know. Kids like them and one seems enough to satisfy them. I like them too, they have a good flavor. The variety is good, gives enough for everyone to find a flavor they like. They are not the perfect snack as they are a bit sticky so it's not the perfect on the go snack but pretty close. As long as the kids still like them but don't go candy crazy they could remain in the routine.
customer_reviews.author: R. Matteson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It is truly my fault for not paying attention to the name, fruit leather, it is truly leathery! Not only are the flavors horrible and not at all true to the fruit but every one tasted the same. I wasted my money because not only are we not thing to eat them, but I don't know anyone I dislike enough to give them away to. I had a similar (but delicious) product awhile ago and thought this was it, I was wrong. I don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Vallejos

customer_reviews.title: So good!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids to snack on throughout the day and we all became obsessed. They are so good, great flavor, and a perfect size for a snack. Flavor choices are great! I love them as an adult and will continue to buy these!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki V.

customer_reviews.title: NOT AS DESCRIBED- missing one item and flavors weren’t distributed evenly.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing frustrates me more than something arriving that’s not as described. This item was supposed to have 8 each of 6 different flavors for a total of 48. My box only had 47 total. It had zero Apple flavor, only 6 Grape and SEVENTEEN Cherry. How the heck does that happen? So annoying!
customer_reviews.author: -one love-

customer_reviews.title: Best snack ever!
customer_reviews.text: Because I'm the queen of impulse shopping and I was hungry, I thought it would be a good idea to buy this box of 48 fruit leathers. I regret nothing! This might be one of my favorite Amazon purchases ever. I love fruit leather and all of the flavors are delicious. The box I received had 8 of each of 6 flavors. Actually, I had an extra 2 raspberry in mine, so it was a box of 50 not 48. Bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Eve R.

customer_reviews.title: Tasty treat
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Most fruit leather tends to be dry and not always tasty. These had the perfect amount of moisture and taste great! My kid did not like them but that just means more for me! I would definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: These are SO. GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, these are good. They don't have a sickly sweet fake flavor like other fruit rollups/leathers. They also don't have a ton of sugar. I mean, they have sugar, but for what they are, they seem an alright infrequent treat if you're doing a carb exchange (15 g = 1 carb portion, these have 12 g, and 1 g fiber). I keep them in my purse for when we're on the go -- my husband gets blood sugar dips and gets HANGRY, so these are a good quick fix. Couldn't tell you which flavor is best, as they're all good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie M.

customer_reviews.title: I should have ordered these much sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on subscribe and save, at a considerably lower price than retail. Let me just say this: I put these in goody bags along with candy and toys for my daughter's birthday. The kiddos went for THESE FIRST. My whole family loves them!! A great way to get them to eat fruit if you have issues otherwise. So handy, soft to eat..flavor is outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: Geekfamily2008

customer_reviews.title: No grape. :(
customer_reviews.text: Just received these today and all three of my kids couldn’t wait to tear into the package. We’ve had these before, so I knew my kids would enjoy them, however, we were disappointed to find that there were no grape fruit leathers (their favorite)! There were eight of all the other flavors, but 0 grape. Kinda weird. Must’ve been a fluke. So 5 stars for being an awesome product- but 2 stars taken away bc of the 8 missing grape flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Golightly

customer_reviews.title: Great purse size snacks!
customer_reviews.text: I carry these with me everywhere. I've used the apple and strawberry flavors as impromptu dog treats while at the vet (my wheat and corn allergic dog needed something to reward him for being a good dog.) I've also got them stashed in my car and they worked great on my road trip around the U.S. even helping a fellow hiker with low blood sugar. I love that there's no added sugar and no artificial colors. My allergies appreciate this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Louise

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good; like fruit pulp
customer_reviews.text: Grape ones taste like high quality grape juice with a texture like a stack of 3 fruit roll ups - love! Apple tastes more natural like fruit pulp - the flavors of apple fruit, skin and seeds come through - and had chewier texture, the way licorice is chewy. Definitely worth buying. And at 50 calories each with nutritional value, it’s a sweet snack I can feel good about eating.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: So I'm not sure what I expected these to taste like (I half expected a gourmet version of Fruit by the Foot or Rollups with less sugar), but although the taste isn't bad (nor good), the consistency is awful. I guess it's a textural thing: they're too thick and then mushy when you chew them; really offputting imho. Wouldn't buy them again or recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dee C.

customer_reviews.title: No added sugar? Can't even tell!!
customer_reviews.text: Taste = Wonderful! Handling = a bit sticky Size = could be bigger, but great lunch add on Healthiness = Guilt free snack-able The strawberry and raspberry flavors are very similar, but they all taste great! Even my 6yr old approves. The only real downside is that they are a bit sticky. But I'll eat 2-3 with a rushed breakfast or lunch and have no shame in it. With no added sugar and made with real fruit you can't really say no.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buddy Guy

customer_reviews.title: Had to give these a chance
customer_reviews.text: I'll be honest, this is my first time trying these and the first one I ate left me underwhelmed. But here's why- I was used to those candy-like fruit snacks. When I ate a few of these, I began to like them more and more. Now I love them and they'll be a cabinet staple. Only 50 calories per piece! I eat two and feel satisfied without the guilt.
customer_reviews.author: CanIGetaZzuuu

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. So much so that I bought 2 boxes before ever even trying it. We are a family of 5 that eat fruit regularly and I make fruit roll-ups in my dehydrator and my kids love them so I thought for sure this would be a hit. No one in my house likes them, including myself. Packaging is amazing but the texture is awful and flavor is lacking. The texture is no where near the same as traditional fruit leather that you make in the dehydrator.
customer_reviews.author: lostcarolina

customer_reviews.title: Missing flavors :-(
customer_reviews.text: Variety pack doesn’t actually have the number of strips indicated on the box. There are supposed to be 8 of each, but our box had more than eight of certain flavors and was missing two flavors all together. I can’t figure out how to contact the seller to fix the problem, this is my only recourse. The fruit strips are amazing. My kids and I love them, we just wish we’d gotten what was advertised. Our two favorite flavors (cherry and raspberry) weren’t even in the box?! Disappointed but will try to buy from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.text: item bottom was hot glued back in place (different glue from the manufacturing glue on sides) and grape fruit snack missing. I am hesitant to eat these now because of that. I am mad now because I enjoy these fruit leather snacks.
customer_reviews.author: C.C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Nope, Nope, Nope
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews about how good these are, I ordered. I must have gotten an out of date or just a bad batch because they are disgusting. Only 1 out of 7 kids will even eat them but that’s not saying much since she eats anything. Leather is an understatement for the texture. Very very hard for a young child to pull off a bite size piece much less chew it up. The flavor isn’t too bad but the tough texture definitely ruins it. I would be willing to try again if it’s possible mine were just a bad batch or old.
customer_reviews.author: Map Broomp

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, terrible packaging control
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first box and had all the flavors in correct amounts. They taste amazing and really satisfy my sweet tooth on my diet. Bought two more boxes, one for me and one for my nephew. One box had 9 strawberry and 7 grape instead of 8 and 8. Second box was only 7 apple so I was jipped out of one entire bar. Who is in charge of counting at this company? Preschoolers? How can they not manage to put the correct amount of product into the box????? Other reviewers have encountered this same issue. You’d think the company would wake up...
customer_reviews.author: Mary B

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We all love it and it's hard for us to all agree on something we like. The flavors and the no sugar really added to the amazement. Definitely ordering more boxes asap!
customer_reviews.author: Harka

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been checking out Amazon for healthy, dairy free/gluten free snacks so we tried these. I've never had fruit leather before we got these so I wasn't sure what to expect. I tried every flavor and love them all! I've already ordered a 2nd box and will probably continue to do so as my whole family loves these. I love that there's no added sugar too! <3
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves these
customer_reviews.text: Use these as a treat for a 3.5 year old. He loves them so much and I try to limit his intake because they are a bit on the sweeter side. Recently compared the sugar content on these to some of his other snacks and its actually less. For example pouch apple sauce has more. As adults we also partake and have these in our wfh snack rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Hakunamatata49

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves these things!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old absolutely loves these and our local grocery store only carries two flavors so Amazon to the rescue lol. I feel better giving these to him over gummies but they do still have quite a bit of sugar. We use these for snacks on the go and will probably use them as options in my preschoolers lunchbox- I do have to say that my four year old can’t open these packages just yet so if you’re sending in a lunchbox maybe put inside a different container or make sure your child can open it before they take it to school (learned my mom lesson there lol).
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m eating my fourth one right now as I write this. I did not want to buy them because there were many reviews that said they were missing some out the box, but I received all of mine. They are so good and the best part is that they are healthy. I originally bought these for my daughter, but..... I’m sorry these are mine now 😂
customer_reviews.author: Nija

customer_reviews.title: Taste great, good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Widely loved by our whole family. These taste great and the ingredients don’t concern us as they make for a nice snack. I think they are great value for money as you get a large number for a low cost. Bought for our 18 month old but we’ve ended up loving them too. Very tasty! (We don’t like grape but that’s because we don’t generally like this flavoring).
customer_reviews.author: nicb

customer_reviews.title: box open, snacks missing
customer_reviews.text: so strange...i’ve been ordering these for about 5 months now and this last time all 8 strawberry were missing. it’s supposed to come with 48, but i received an open box with all strawberry removed? this is rather annoying for us 1 because we paid for 48 and 2 because one of my children’s favorite is the strawberry and there aren’t any. i tried to find a way to contact the company directly on here, but don’t see an option. i’ll likely be canceling this subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Leeann

customer_reviews.title: Great candy replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted something slightly healthier to replace candy. They're still plenty sweet, but don't have added sugar. All the flavors are distinct, but the fruit snacks are all apple-based, so they do have a dried-apple undertone. They're a soft snack that isn't rubbery or stretchy. I like the cherry and strawberry flavors the best.
customer_reviews.author: teacup

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: We love them! They are disappearing fast! We love that there are six flavors to choose from. The only thing that baffled me was the big box the leathers came in. It's just a big box and the individual packs are loose in it. They could be in a big bag. Perhaps it's because the cardboard box is more sustainable than a plastic bag.
customer_reviews.author: CreativePeach

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was less sweet
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious but the only problem is that all of the flavors are very sweet. I wish at least one of them was a bit sour. It says on the cover that it has "0g added sugar", but still they are all sweet taste fruit leathers.
customer_reviews.author: V AD

customer_reviews.title: Much less expensive than the grocery store
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Super soft and fresh. They are definitely the leathers and not the new "strips" that are much thicker. Keep an eye on the price and stock up when it's low!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Yummy snack for toddler and mommy
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing. I usually purchase a smaller box at a local warehouse club in my area and found these on Amazon. I noticed the variety and had to try them. Great for the entire family. The only flavor that lingers is the apricot, but even that one tastes great. The fruit leather is soft, but not too much that it sticks in your teeth. I buy this as a snack for my toddler, but mommy takes one to work now and then since they are so tasty. The apple in this pack is actually different than the warehouse club, a great surprise.
customer_reviews.author: robobearzTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent school treats!
customer_reviews.text: Several of our kids teacher's have requested that I donate these for class holiday treat days instead of an actual candy treat (Halloween, v. Day, etc). Also been sending these in my kid's lunch boxes for years now as an extra snack. They're a good value and like that they are made with real fruit.
customer_reviews.author: A.Mom

customer_reviews.title: Would Not Buy Again!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointing!! No taste, no nutrition!! Expected a nutritional product with some taste, it didn’t deliver! “Leather” in the name should have tipped me off. It was so bad, I checked to see if it was out of date. Grandparents and 6 grandkids say thumbs down!!
customer_reviews.author: Bamano1

customer_reviews.title: Family had loved these for years! Good vendor!
customer_reviews.text: I have received these many times through subscription from this vendor and they are alway fresh and exactly as expected. I’ve loved these for years and especially love their large variety pack for my family. We have to keep these on subscription because we go through them very, very fast as after school snacks, at swim meets, and in my car and office desk. Perfect nonperishable solution when fresh fruit isn’t on hand or hard to take along.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Pure Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: My entire family LOVE these fruit leathers! They are the perfect size for those snack cravings with absolutely no added sugar, which we love for our kiddos :) The texture is just right and flavor is explosively awesome! Just go ahead and sign up for the subscribe and save - they're convenient and guilt-free.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Sumrell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Wow these are great! All %100 Fruit from puree, each snack equals 1/4 cup serving of fruit. No artificial anything. I originally purchased these in attempt to find something for my dad who is a Vietnam Vet, suffering from Agent Orange, takes chemotherapy once a week. He says he has no taste buds function, eats lemons buy the pounds, because one of few things he can taste. We were quite surprised that he could taste these, in fact loves them, only wishes for lemon flavored. So ty Stretch Island Fruit for a great product, you made an old Veteran smile.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyH

customer_reviews.title: Picky kids
customer_reviews.text: We loved these but unfortunately some of the flavors were pretty tart for my kids. They even bordered on saying that the apple and raspberry ones were sour. Saying that they were a complete hit with my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki5pan

customer_reviews.title: No added Sugar
customer_reviews.text: These are a great on the go snack. There are a variety of flavors, limited ingredients, and no added sugar. I wish there was less plastic packaging, but that’s a trade off for individually packaged snacks. I like that they are offered as subscription making purchasing easy.
customer_reviews.author: myAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not to shabby
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, all fruit leathers accounted for, expiration date gives them 9 months before they go bad. They were a little more "leathery" feel then I was expecting. I guess I thought theyd be more like the fruit strips I'm used to getting from aldi or Wal-Mart. Which are more moist, I guess. Theses were more dryer, not hard or anything, still tasty. I don't know if I'd buy them again cuz there's alot of them and I think it'll take me a while to eat em up(at least 9 months) I like that there's different flavors...
customer_reviews.author: jlee

customer_reviews.title: Add it to oatmeal!!
customer_reviews.text: When I ran out of my dried fruit for my morning oatmeal I remembered I had some of this fruit leather in the cupboard. So I tore a couple strawberry fruit leather strips up and poured hot water over them. After they softened up a bit i added some steel cut oats and walnuts and nuked it for a couple minutes. Never had strawberry walnut oatmeal before...but it turned out delicious!! No added salt, sugar or other additives! Great for cold mornings in the northern plains!
customer_reviews.author: Smalljen

customer_reviews.title: Taste just like the preserved fruit in Christmas Cake Logs.
customer_reviews.text: New look and New disgusting taste. I used to love these, now I just hate them to the point that I will not buy any more until the old recipe is used or the original fruit suppliers are used. Just bring back the original taste, they currently taste like preserved fruit used in Christmas Cake Logs.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Delicious guilt-free snack!
customer_reviews.text: We love fruit snacks in general but most of them have so many added ingredients that they actually aren't very "fruity" any more... but these are! These taste like actual fruit and are sweet enough to satisfy your sweet tooth snack attacks! This variety pack should be enough to last us a week or two (or 3 days, since none of us can stay out of them...)
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Loved fruit roll-ups as a child, and this fruit leather is simply the best. All natural, no sugar, etc. Healthy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Carol Robbin

customer_reviews.title: Delicious for adults and kids
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these. It is nice to have a healthy treat that is pre-packaged that we can have for on-the-go. They are obviously thin so they don't take up room in the diaper bag. They do well in weather conditions, meaning they don't melt or get sticky when they've been kept in my hot car. The packaging is easy enough for my 4 year old to open. We each love all of the flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this box is incomplete.
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and noticed right away that pieces were missing. There were supposed to be 8 or each but this box was missing 6 pieces. I'm livid that they would let someone send opened merchandise. Don't but it you will be sorry like I am. She to Dog is no one will help you.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Biello

customer_reviews.title: A hit with picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: We stumbled upon these for my very (VERY) picky toddler and they’ve become a hit for everyone in the family! I’m happy because they’re both tasty and healthy! But they don’t have the unappealing healthy look of other fruit leathers. They have very distinct flavors for each fruit in the variety pack, unlike other brands. They travel well- no sticky mess if accidentally left in a hot car. We have a hard time finding them in our local stores and enjoy the convenience of ordering the value pack on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: WhitneyC

customer_reviews.title: Not that healthy boring flavor.
customer_reviews.text: While these are not the worst snack they become dull and borring to eat very quickly. They all taste of the same flavor except for mango. As far as health benefits go dont buy these for a healthy snack when you strip fruit of its fiber your literally taking the only healthy nutritional value of fruit and throwing it away. Causing blood sugar spikes unlike when you eat actual fruit its digested more slowly not causing spikes.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Don't have them delivered in the heat!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful about when you purchase these. I purchased them in the summertime and they arrived on a hot day (about 85 degrees out and humid). Many of the fruit strips were melted and/or incredibly sticky. Some of them were fine. Overall, my children and I like the Stretch Island Fruit Leather - they have a great taste and I feel better about giving them to my kids than fruit snacks. However, I'm going to be cautious about what time of year I have them delivered next time.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Fruit Roll Ups
customer_reviews.text: My kids think these are great. There is no added sugar and there are so many different flavors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to go with 4.5 stars. The only reason why I'm not giving a full five stars is that some of the flavors are very subtle and taste a little bit like each other. But overall they are very good and at a great price. At about 23 cents each, I can let my daughter take two in her lunches each day. I've also been eating one in the evenings to curb my sweet tooth. I've put these on my subscribe and save so that I don't have to remember to reorder them.
customer_reviews.author: Steven and Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kids as a healthier option to put in their lunch box, they didn’t go over very well. My 3 year old son could eat this only after I gave him a cup of water, it was too dry for his liking, then the novelty of it wore off before he could finished it. I like that they’re healthy with no added sugar but what’s the point if my kids won’t eat them, I’ll keep these for myself but won’t be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my mother who goes to dialysis 3 times a week, she was unable to last so long without her sugar dropping and this being a more healthy alternate to other choices she enjoys them a lot, my elderly grandmother also loves them as a snack for when her sugar drops. For the price you couldn't get a better lot of fruit leathers, sometimes they're a little sticky but its a rather small price to pay for something tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Rold

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids can't get enough of these! So yummy. They are sticky, but I'll take that over them wanting candy or something really unhealthy. They think these are a treat and I love that!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My niece and nephew love these and their food picky mother loves that I buy them for them so that they are getting wholesome food instead of junk for snacks. One box usually lasts a while with both of them eating on it. I feel good about buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Rock

customer_reviews.title: I received all the correct number of flavors, missing none.
customer_reviews.text: Unlike some of the other reviewers. I received all the correct number of flavors, missing none. Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Me and My 2 Kids didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, I was pleasantly surprised by the huge box and the quantity but they don't taste yummy. Even my 5 year old hates it. The texture is off as well. Its not stretchy at all, so don't expect stretchy type of fruit pack. They are very stiff but when you bite them there is no pull, not like fruit leather. More like a flat fruit stick. Its not very sweet what-so-ever, its more on the sour/bitter side. Just not for us. Would love to return these.
customer_reviews.author: sweetdream2001

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor Selection!
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find an inexpensive source for these delicious all-fruit treats. My kids both love them, and this is the only place I've found that has the 6-flavor pack (even Costco only has 4 of the flavors). Great price, and love that it's available through Subscribe & Save for additional savings.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfactory
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the Amazon box the product was open and missing half of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These things here...let me tell you....if you haven't had one, get one now. These hands down blow those fake "fruit" things out of the water. My kids love these. I love these. I keep a box in my office when I want something sweet. And..annnnnd if you went to Sprouts or Publix and just but 1 piece? Easily 3.99. For serious! This is a deal! No, it's a steal. They're delicious and amazingly priced. Craaazzzzyyyyy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine L.

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY! We love these.
customer_reviews.text: These fruit leathers are very tasty. My husband and I both like them a lot. His favorite is the apple flavor and mine is the raspberry. I like that they are made with 100% fruit ingredients with no added sugar, so they are actually good for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lewis

product_meta.title: Stretch Island Fruit Leather Snacks Variety Pack, 0.5 Ounce, Pack of 48
product_meta.description: Style:Fruit LeatherStretch Island Fruit Leather Variety Pack contains autumn apple, abundant apricot, orchard cherry, harvest grape, ripened raspberry, and summer strawberry.It is 100 percent natural, the original fruit leather. This comes with Kosher with the "circle K" symbol.
feature_bullets: PACK OF 48, 0.5 ounce strips of Stretch Island All Natural Fruit Leathers in a variety of flavors
REAL FRUIT: 1/4 cup of real fruit per strip
ZERO ADDED SUGAR: Made exclusively with real fruit puree no added sugar
ALL NATURAL: No artificial flavors, preservatives, or colors gluten free, non GMO, and vegan
CONVENIENT: Take anywhere, pre wrapped single serving strips of pure fruit

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
